Questions.Question: Who said, 'The only way to do great work is to love what you do'?
Questions.Explanation: Steve Jobs, the co-founder of Apple Inc., emphasized the importance of passion in achieving success.

Questions.Question: Which famous author said, 'The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be'?
Questions.Explanation: Ralph Waldo Emerson, a renowned American essayist, highlighted the power of personal choice and determination.

Questions.Question: Who said, 'Believe you can and you're halfway there'?
Questions.Explanation: Theodore Roosevelt, the 26th President of the United States, emphasized the importance of self-belief and confidence.

Questions.Question: Which famous motivational speaker said, 'Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life'?
Questions.Explanation: Steve Jobs, the co-founder of Apple Inc., encouraged individuals to live authentically and pursue their own dreams.

Questions.Question: Who said, 'Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts'?
Questions.Explanation: Winston Churchill, the former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, emphasized the importance of resilience and perseverance.

Questions.Question: Which famous author said, 'The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today'?
Questions.Explanation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, the 32nd President of the United States, highlighted the role of self-belief in achieving future success.

Questions.Question: Who said, 'The best revenge is massive success'?
Questions.Explanation: Frank Sinatra, a legendary singer and actor, suggested that achieving great success is the most powerful form of revenge.

Questions.Question: Which famous entrepreneur said, 'The biggest risk is not taking any risk'?
Questions.Explanation: Mark Zuckerberg, the co-founder of Facebook, emphasized the importance of taking calculated risks in entrepreneurship.

Questions.Question: Who said, 'The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams'?
Questions.Explanation: Eleanor Roosevelt, a former First Lady of the United States, highlighted the significance of having faith in one's dreams.

Questions.Question: Which famous author said, 'You miss 100% of the shots you don't take'?
Questions.Explanation: Wayne Gretzky, a legendary ice hockey player, emphasized the importance of taking opportunities and risks.
